title: Advanced Social Media Data Analysis: Neural Network-Based NLP Techniques

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational natural language processing (NLP) theory, machine learning concepts, and basic Python programming
context.additional_context: Learners possess graduate-level language analysis research competencies and engage in practice-oriented learning in asynchronous environments. Must have access to LMS and analytical tools via personal devices.

learning_goals: Learners can apply neural network models (BERT/GPT) to perform sentiment analysis on social media text data
Learners can extract semantic structures from unstructured social data using NER (Named Entity Recognition) and topic modeling techniques
Learners can design and evaluate pipelines for real-time social media trend analysis
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
